ComicInfo.Penciller: Andy Park,Brian Ching,Roger Cruz,Andy Park,Brian Ching,Roger Cruz
ComicInfo.Summary: Marcus has been promoted to the throne of Minea and he manages to convince the council to raise a ban against Petra who is now barred from her home world. In the meantime, the mysterious woman, Rowina, returns to Minea after an exile of a thousand years with a new grip on its people
ComicInfo.Tags: Hela,Lucien Barnes,Petra,Dayaks,Kenneth Irons,Mineans,Andromeda Weaver,Rowina,Gavin Taylor,Marcus,New York City
